alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Pierce; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 3:02AM CDT until July 24 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Wayne County in northeastern Nebraska... Eastern Pierce County in northeastern Nebraska... Southwestern Cedar County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 302 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles east of Osmond, or 21 miles north of Norfolk, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Randolph around 310 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
